content:
A Japanese Edo-period Ukiyo-e woodblock print. The overall feeling is a surreal collaboration between masters like Hokusai and Hiroshige, reimagining modern technology through an ancient lens.

**The scene:** {argument name="modern scene" default="a busy Shibuya scramble crossing"}

**Edo transformation logic:**
Characters wear Edo-era kimono but perform modern actions. All technology is transformed into surreal Edo equivalents:
* Smartphones are glowing, illustrated paper scrolls being read intently.
* Metro stations and trains are giant articulated wooden centipede carriages shuffling through crowds.
* Skyscrapers are reimagined as endless, towering wooden pagodas reaching into dramatic clouds.
* Robots and mecha appear as giant, armored woodblock golems.

The composition uses a flattened perspective with large, bold, hand-carved ink outlines. The background features heavily stylized Ukiyo-e wave patterns and dramatic, swirling clouds, with a distant Mt. Fuji visible on the horizon.

The image must look like a physical print, not a digital painting.
* Texture: strong visible wood grain texture and rough paper fibers throughout the piece.
* Printing imperfections: pigment bleeding is evident. Simulate hand-pressed plates with slight color misalignment for authenticity.
* Color palette: strictly limited to traditional mineral pigments, with dominant use of Prussian blue, vermilion red, and muted yellow ochre.
* Lighting: soft, flat, shadow-free lighting with no digital gradients.

Aspect ratio is 3:4 vertical poster. Include vertical Japanese calligraphy describing the scene and a traditional red artist seal stamp in a corner.

content:
A surreal hyper-realistic cinematic video of a colossal macaron megastructure under construction, envisioned as a futuristic architectural spire made entirely of oversized pastel macarons. Each macaron tier functions like a rotating skyscraper floor, subtly spiraling upward as the structure grows. Crisp glossy shells with sculptural ruffled edges and softly glowing cream fillings ooze slightly in slow motion, catching the light.
Tiny miniature construction workers in reflective vests, hard hats, harnesses, and safety gear move with purposeful realism: rappelling down macaron surfaces, welding delicate sugar-like support ribs, laser-measuring seams, signaling to cranes, and guiding a levitating macaron layer suspended by synchronized cables. A massive yellow crane slowly lifts the top macaron into place while smaller cranes, excavators, and dump trucks operate below on a powdered-sugar terrain.
Camera movement is cinematic and deliberate: slow vertical crane-up shots revealing scale, macro close-ups of textured macaron shells and creamy fillings, then wide aerial pulls showing the entire tower disappearing into thick vanilla-tinted fog. Volumetric god rays pierce the mist, soft particles float in the air, and subtle motion blur enhances realism. Lighting is dramatic yet elegant, blending industrial grit with whimsical luxury.
Ultra-detailed photorealistic textures contrast smooth dessert surfaces with worn construction machinery. Dreamlike but believable physics, gentle ambient motion, no abrupt cuts, seamless transitions. Vertical composition, epic scale contrast, surreal food-architecture world, cinematic depth of field, 8K realism, slow majestic pacing.

content:
Use the uploaded image exactly as the base/reference. Do not change the subjectsâ€™ faces, poses, camera angle, or composition. Preserve facial features and expression. Recreate a vertical cinematic movie-poster based on this image with the following specifications:
Canvas: vertical poster, aspect ratio 2:3 (e.g. 4000Ã—6000 px). High-res, photoreal, print-quality (minimum 300 DPI).
Composition: keep the shipâ€™s bow centered and dominating the lower two-thirds; keep the couple faded and large in the top third as in the uploaded image (overlay/blend). Do not move or re-pose subjects.
Lighting & mood: cinematic golden-hour rim light on faces, soft warm highlights, cool deep shadows on the hull; strong contrast with gentle atmospheric mist; subtle film grain and slight vignette for vintage cinematic look.
Color grade: warm skin highlights, slightly desaturated midtones, deep navy/charcoal hull, soft cyan sky with white cloud details; natural skin texture preserved (no smoothing).
Ship details: maintain the bowâ€™s perspective and railing lines; add realistic water spray/splash at the hull base, small white foam particles; keep deck rail details sharp.
Overlay blend: the couple at the top should be semi-translucent, softly feathered into the sky; maintain original hair, jewelry, and clothing details.
Title & typography: center the single word {argument name="title" default="TITANIC"} across the bottom third in large serif (Trajan Pro / classic film serif), all caps, wide tracking, pure white with subtle drop shadow and tiny bevel; place title exactly like the reference.
Effects/finishing: increase perceived sharpness on ship hull and title; keep couple slightly softer; apply subtle film grain, mild chromatic aberration, and filmic contrast curve.
Negative constraints: no additional people or logos, no modern artifacts (phones, text), no watermark, no unnatural skin smoothness, no heavy plastic look.

content:
A clean 3x3 [{argument name="aspect ratio" default="ratio"}] storyboard grid, composed of nine equally sized [{argument name="aspect ratio" default="ratio"}] frames, with an overall aspect ratio of [4:5].
Use the reference image as the basic reference for the product. The same product must be maintained in all nine frames, with completely consistent packaging design, brand logo, material, color, proportion, and overall visual identity. The product must be clearly discernible in every frame, and the label, logo, and proportion must remain exactly the same.
This storyboard is intended for brand visual display in high-end designer portfolios, focusing on form, composition, material expression, and visual rhythm, rather than realism or lifestyle narrative. The overall style should present a carefully planned, editorial, and strong design-oriented high-level aesthetic.
Frame 1: Front main visual product image, clean studio environment, neutral background, balanced composition, the product presents a calm, confident, and stable temperament.
Frame 2: Close-up shot, focus concentrated on the middle of the product, highlighting surface texture, material quality, and printing details.
Frame 3: The product is placed in an environment highly consistent with the brand and category, studio scene, inspired by the design elements and color scheme of the product itself.
Frame 4: The product in a state of use or interaction, with a neutral studio style background, restrained and simple hands and interaction elements, the overall style must be consistent with the packaging design.
Frame 5: Isometric perspective composition, presenting multiple products from an overhead isometric angle, arranged in precise geometric order, uniform angle, even spacing, clean image, clear structure, and strong graphic quality.
Frame 6: The product is slightly tilted and suspended in the air, with a neutral background consistent with the color scheme of the reference image. The suspension angle is natural and deliberately designed, presenting a stable and elegant floating state.
Frame 7: Extreme macro close-up, focusing on a specific detail of the label, edge, texture, or material.
Frame 8: The product is placed in an unexpected but extremely aesthetic and dynamic scene, with a bold style, editorial feel, and strong visual impact. The scene must be studio-shot and design-driven, with a dynamic composition that strengthens the brand tone.
Frame 9: Wide composition, showing the product in a usage context, placed in a refined, designed scene, with simple props and controlled styling, highly unified with the style of the entire set of images.
Camera and Style: Ultra-high quality studio photography, real camera texture. Different frames use different camera positions and compositions, precise depth of field control, strict lighting, and realistic materials and reflections. The overall light and shadow logic, color system, emotional atmosphere, and visual language must maintain high consistency across the nine frames, forming a complete and coherent series.
Output Requirement: Presented as a clean 3x3 grid, without borders, text, descriptions, or watermarks.

content:
Real human body + spiritual light phantom behind

Overall Style and Quality
Visual Style: Top-tier realistic cultivation scroll, surreal cinematic commercial blockbuster, hardcore Eastern fantasy aesthetic.
Core Parameters: 8K ultra-high resolution, film texture, real skin texture (rejecting plastic/anime feel).
Physical Rules: Realistic light and shadow simulation, emphasizing the character's gravity and physical feedback in a specific environment.
Composition Strategy: Ultra-wide horizontal composition. The twelve Zodiac incarnations are arranged scattered from left to right in the same grand immortal realm, with no visual blind spots.
Unified Worldview: The scene is set in the unified â€œHongmeng Immortal Realm.â€ The environment gradually transitions from the chaotic spiritual veins on the left to the sea of clouds and immortal traces on the right. All characters share the same set of atmospheric light and shadow; the actual Zodiac animals are strictly prohibited from appearing.

Core Visual Features
â€¢ Character Form: All figures are real human forms with extremely high aesthetic value, retaining human facial features and skin texture.
â€¢ Zodiac Representation: Zodiac characteristics are embodied through the characters' clothing tailoring, color details, personal magical treasures, and the grand â€œBeast Spirit/Martial Soulâ€ phantom composed of pure spiritual light behind the character.
â€¢ Beast Spirit Manifestation: The Beast Spirit appears as a translucent light state or phantom, entirely woven from flowing spiritual energy and radiance, lacking physical texture, enveloping the character from behind and above like a miracle, full of divinity.

Photography and Lighting
â€¢ Equipment: Canon EOS R5, 35mm prime lens.
â€¢ Lighting Design: Uniformly illuminated by the â€œImmortal Realm Morning Glow,â€ light enters from one side of the frame, creating the Tyndall effect.
â€¢ Ambient Light Compensation: The Beast Spirit light and shadow behind the character emit a soft innate spiritual light, refracting with the clouds, mist, and sword energy in the immortal realm.

Character Distribution and Detailed Description
1. Rat (Water): Far right, sea of clouds. Human form is a nimble youth in dark attire, with a massive, light-translucent Rat phantom suspended behind, eyes alert.
2. Ox (Earth): A steady, strong man in dark bronze heavy armor. Behind him stands a mountain-like Azure Ox light phantom, demonstrating the power to lift mountains.
3. Tiger (Wood): A dominant commander in a black and gold tiger-striped robe. Behind him is a Tiger Spirit light phantom, with flowing light and shadow, seemingly descending from the mountain.
4. Rabbit (Wood): A cool, ethereal fairy in a moon-white flowing immortal dress. Accompanied by a Jade Rabbit phantom, entirely condensed from white light and emitting soft radiance, creating an ethereal atmosphere.
5. Dragon (Metal): Occupying a high position, in a dark dragon scale robe, supremely noble. Behind him coils a hundred-zhang long, majestic and sacred Giant Dragon spiritual light phantom.
6. Snake (Fire): A seductive mystic in a purple snake-patterned satin robe. Behind her slithers a long, deep, Spiritual Snake phantom composed of purple flowing light.
7. Horse (Fire): A valiant sword cultivator in crimson battle gear. Behind him is a fiery Steed light phantom, hooves treading fire, ready to gallop.
8. Sheep (Earth): A gentle healer in a beige cotton and linen immortal dress. Behind her appears a peaceful, hazy White Sheep light phantom, like auspicious clouds.
9. Monkey (Metal): An untamed battle expert in battle-damaged gold armor. Behind him is a Monkey Spirit light phantom, holding a divine weapon and looking down upon the world.
10. Rooster (Metal): The dawn watcher, in a feather-cut battle robe. Wings spread behind him, revealing a flowing gold, radiant Phoenix light phantom, like a mirage.
11. Dog (Earth): A loyal general in leather and metal light armor. Behind him is an upright, protective Spiritual Dog light phantom.
12. Pig (Water): Far left, by the spiritual spring. A leisurely immortal in loose blue robes. Behind him swirls a deeply blessed Spiritual Pig phantom, composed of rich aura.

Final Vision
This is no longer a collection of isolated individuals, but an epic assembly of the twelve Zodiac deities in a unified immortal realm. Through the visual structure of â€œReal Human Body + Spiritual Light Phantom Behind,â€ it perfectly balances the emotional beauty of humans with the mythological depth of the Zodiac, constructing the ultimate Eastern fantasy universe.
title: Epic Chinese Fantasy Zodiac Deities Prompt (12 Characters)
description: An extremely detailed, structured prompt for Nano Banana Pro designed to generate an epic, ultra-realistic cinematic scroll of the 12 Chinese Zodiac deities (in human form) assembled in a grand celestial realm (Hongmeng Immortal Realm). The prompt specifies a unified world view, 8K resolution, film texture, and details how each zodiac sign is represented by a high-value human form accompanied by a massive, translucent 'Beast Spirit/Martial Soul' light projection behind them, detailing the specific appearance, attire, and location of all 12 characters.

content:
Epic 3D scene: a weathered passport lies open, its visa stamps erupting into the destinations they represent. Each ink impression becomes a portalâ€”[{argument name="city 1" default="CITY 1"}] rises in miniature from one stamp with [{argument name="detail 1" default="DETAIL 1"}], [CITY 2] pushes through another with [DETAIL 2], [CITY 3] manifests with [DETAIL 3]. [LANDMARK 1], [LANDMARK 2], and [LANDMARK 3] stand at different scales across the pages. Flight paths arc overhead as glowing golden trajectories weaving between all the worlds.
Coffee stains become lakes. Worn edges erode into coastlines. [ATMOSPHERIC ELEMENT 1] drifts from one destination while [ATMOSPHERIC ELEMENT 2] swirls near another.
Dramatic raking light, tilt-shift depth of field, 8K, UE5, cinematic lighting. The bureaucratic document transformed into a living archive of adventures.
title: Epic 3D Passport Odyssey Scene
description: A highly creative prompt for generating an epic 3D scene where a weathered passport opens, and its visa stamps physically erupt into miniature, detailed cityscapes (like [CITY 1] and [CITY 2]). It uses tilt-shift, dramatic lighting, and UE5 style to transform the bureaucratic document into a living archive of adventures.

content: Create a single Major Arcana tarot card featuring one randomly selected official Sanrio character from this list: Hello Kitty, My Melody, Kuromi, Cinnamoroll, Pompompurin, Keroppi, Badtz-Maru, Little Twin Stars (Kiki & Lala), Chococat, Tuxedo Sam, Gudetama, Aggretsuko, Hangyodon, Dear Daniel, or Usahana. CRITICAL: The character MUST be assigned a randomly chosen zodiac theme AND a randomly chosen Major Arcana card (The Fool, The Magician, The High Priestess, The Empress, The Emperor, The Hierophant, The Lovers, The Chariot, Strength, The Hermit, Wheel of Fortune, Justice, The Hanged Man, Death, Temperance, The Devil, The Tower, The Star, The Moon, The Sun, Judgement, The World) - both assignments are non-negotiable and mandatory. The zodiac symbolism must be woven into the tarot card's meaning and visual metaphors. Render in traditional tarot card proportions (2.75:4.75 ratio, portrait orientation) with an ornate decorative border featuring Art Nouveau-inspired flowing lines, celestial motifs, and geometric patterns that reference both the zodiac sign and tarot symbolism. The character must be depicted with 100% canonical accuracy maintaining exact official Sanrio proportions and features, positioned centrally as the card's main subject in a pose that embodies the tarot card's archetypal meaning. The entire composition must be a high-quality risograph print simulation featuring authentic soy-based ink grain texture that mimics absorption on uncoated 80-120gsm paper stock, stochastic dot stippling using randomized diffusion dither patterns (not regular halftone grids), fine sand-like noise within all color fills simulating Grain Touch screening mode, organic ink density variations creating tonal shifts without smooth gradients, slight dot gain effect at color boundaries, and spot color separation logic with translucent ink layering behavior rather than CMYK process colors. Colors must be bold, flat, vibrant, and fully saturated (80-100% chroma) with maximum brightness, utilizing fluorescent ink vibrancy where appropriate and showing no fading, desaturation, or washed-out pastels. The border design should use a maximum of 3-4 spot colors plus black, with the character surrounded by a thick uniform black outline (3-4pt stroke weight). Background within the border should be cream/off-white (#FFF8E7) to simulate aged tarot card stock. The output must be 3000Ã—5200px resolution in sRGB, containing absolutely no text labels, character names, tarot card titles, zodiac symbols (â™ˆâ™‰â™Šâ™‹â™Œâ™â™â™â™â™‘â™’â™“), Roman numerals, descriptive typography, or dimensional effects like drop shadows.
title: Sanrio Tarot Card Risograph Simulation
description: A highly specific prompt for generating a single Major Arcana tarot card featuring a randomly selected official Sanrio character. The prompt mandates combining the character with a random zodiac theme and rendering the final image as an ultra-detailed risograph print simulation, focusing on authentic textures, stochastic dot stippling, and bold, flat spot colors.

It takes an uploaded image and composites a grayscale portrait of the subject wearing sunglasses over a bold, repeating red and white typographic background, emphasizing a sharp, editorial, and high-impact visual style.

content: Flavor theme: ã€{argument name="flavor theme" default="Strawberry"}ã€‘. Ultra-premium dessert advertising poster, hyper-realistic and intensely mouth-watering. A tall crystal sundae glass centered, filled with a rich creamy dessert inspired by the flavor theme, paired with multiple distinct complementary ingredients from the same flavor profile and color palette, clearly different in form, texture, or preparation, even when the flavor theme itself is visually obvious; for visually ambiguous or dairy-based flavors, include clearly recognizable solid garnish elements derived from the flavor itself. Ice cream scoops appear dense, cold, and creamy with soft melting edges. Flavor-matched liquid splashes originate clearly from inside the glass, bursting upward and outward from the dessert itself, thick, glossy, and gravity-driven, flowing in irregular ribbons and droplets, coating the rim and inner walls of the glass in slow motion. Fruits or accents appear juicy with visible moisture, some placed in the foreground for depth. Seamless infinite studio background in a refined mid-to-dark tone, clean and texture-free, softly lit with subtle tonal gradients, color-matched to the flavor theme. Cinematic lighting, shallow depth of field, high-end commercial aesthetic, indulgent yet refined, hyper-detailed, 8k quality. No text, no logo, no watermark, no packaging, no frame, no CGI or cartoon look.

description: A template prompt designed for generating hyper-realistic, intensely mouth-watering advertising posters of ice cream sundaes. The prompt is parameterized to easily swap the flavor theme, which dictates the visual elements, color palette, and garnishes, ensuring a high-end commercial aesthetic.

content:
A vibrant 2000s scrapbook-style collage featuring the same young man in multiple cutout poses. One portrait is centered and large, showing him wearing round glasses and a black hoodie, making a finger-heart gesture toward the camera. Other cutouts show him squatting with a vintage instant camera, and another blowing a pink bubblegum bubble.  

The background looks like an open sketchbook with textured paper, filled with colorful paint strokes in rainbow tones, playful doodles, arrows, stars, hearts, butterflies, smiley faces, and pop-art stickers. Bold, bubbly typography stickers read phrases like â€œ2000s Vibes,â€ â€œDream Big,â€ â€œBe Yourself,â€ â€œCool Dude,â€ â€œSay Cheese,â€ and â€œPop!â€  

The overall aesthetic is nostalgic, cheerful, and youthful â€” inspired by early 2000s teen magazines and scrapbook journals. High saturation, soft lighting, clean white sticker outlines around each cutout, whimsical and fun mood, creative flat-lay composition, digital collage illustration style.

content: A highly stylized, hyper-exaggerated Comic caricature in the vein of 70s Blaxploitation movie posters. The hip-hop duo Luniz are depicted as larger-than-life, over-the-top 70s pimp archetypes inside a gritty, neon-lit strip club. One member, wearing an exaggerated wide-lapel velvet suit and massive gold chains, has a comically oversized hand placed on the hip of a stylized go-go dancer in retro attire. A bold, jagged comic book speech bubble erupts from his mouth containing the heavy block text: "{argument name="speech bubble text" default="I GOT 5 ON IT"}". The other member stands beside him, laughing with a stack of cash. The scene features thick outlines, heavy black inking, vibrant flat colors, and a prominent halftone dot texture. Lighting is high-contrast and dramatic, using a deep color palette of burnt orange, mustard yellow, deep purple, and electric blue neon hues. The background is crowded with stylized patrons, abstract neon signs like "{argument name="neon sign text" default="THE LOONY JOINT"}", and heavy smoke. Cel-shaded, graphic novel illustration, cinematic composition, highly detailed caricature action scene.

content:
**Prompt Title:** The Austrian Oak's Volumetric Anatomy

**Prompt:**

A monumental, highly graphic, high-contrast silhouette of Arnold Schwarzenegger in his 1970s prime, perfectly executing a classic Side Chest pose. The exterior outline of the physique is rendered as a razor-sharp, pure black (0% light) shape, creating an extreme visual boundary.

The entire internal negative space within the silhouette is intricately filled with a photorealistic, dense Austrian mountain forest landscapeâ€”specifically, deep coniferous pines and firs of the Hohe Tauern region. The scene within the body is captured at the peak of Golden Hour sunset. Deep, rich hues of fire orange, crimson, and violet dominate the internal sky.

Crucially, intense, focused volumetric god rays and sun shafts cut dramatically through the thick forest canopy, filtering dust and mist. These light shafts meticulously trace and illuminate the underlying anatomy: the beams define the striations of the pectoral muscle, the peaks of the biceps, and the separation of the deltoids. The light filtering through the trees *is* the muscle definition.

**Camera Settings:**
Shot on Hasselblad X2D, 135mm prime lens. Wide aperture (f/2.8) for maximum environmental detail within the silhouette.

**Lighting Details:**
Extreme hard backlighting defines the silhouette against a neutral, slightly hazy background. Internal lighting is Deep Golden Hour, intense volumetric mist/fog, strong rim light defining individual tree branches and forming anatomical detail.

**Stylistic Notes:**
Masterpiece cinematic photography. Hyper-detailed realism within the silhouette. Maximal resolution. Aspect ratio 16:9. --ar 16:9 --v 6.0 --s 750
title: Arnold Schwarzenegger Silhouette with Volumetric Mountain Forest
description: A highly conceptual and technical prompt for generating a monumental, high-contrast image. It depicts Arnold Schwarzenegger in a Side Chest pose, where the internal negative space of his pure black silhouette is filled with a photorealistic, volumetric Austrian mountain forest scene at Golden Hour. The light rays within the forest are used to define the anatomical striations of the muscle.

content:
Do this for {argument name="input band" default="Pink Floyd"}: Input Variable: [INSERT BAND/ALBUM] (e.g., Pink Floyd, Daft Punk, Nirvana)
System Instruction:
Act as a Music Historian and Set Designer. Create a 2x2 Grid of "Audio-Visual Dioramas."
1. The Curation Logic (The Deep Cuts):
Analyze Input: Identify the genre and sonic signature of the Input Band.
Select 4 Hidden Gems: Identify 4 lesser-known albums from other bands that share this sonic DNA but offer a different visual flavor.
The Translation: For each album, define the "Sonic Materiality":
If Heavy Metal: Rusty Iron, Fire, Spikes.
If Synth-Pop: Neon Glass, Chrome, Laser Grids.
If Folk/Acoustic: Mossy Wood, Stone, Candlelight.
If Prog Rock: Surreal Marble, Floating Prisms, Clouds.
2. The "Immutable" Container (The Vinyl Stage):
The Base: Each diorama is built on top of a Spinning Vinyl Record acting as the circular stage floor.
The Plinth: The record sits on a high-end, thick Audiophile Turntable Base (Wood or Brushed Aluminum).
The Nameplate (CRITICAL TEXT FIX): On the vertical front face of the Plinth, there is a Polished Brass or Digital Display Plate.
Text Rule: It must clearly display the [ARTIST NAME] in bold, legible, capital letters.
3. The Composition (The Sound Made Solid):
CRITICAL: Do not just recreate the album cover. Build a world that feels like the music.
The Structure: Architecture rises from the grooves of the vinyl record.
Example: A wall of amplifiers, a surreal floating prism, a crumbling brick wall, or a forest of microphone stands.
The Atmosphere: Use particle effects to visualize the sound waves.
Visuals: Floating musical notes made of smoke, vibrating liquid surfaces, or shattered glass suspended in mid-air.
The Figures: Tiny 1:87 scale band members performing inside this surreal landscape.
4. Visual Syntax (Per Panel):
Panel A: Album 1 (Focus on Surrealism/Scale).
Panel B: Album 2 (Focus on Technology/Machinery).
Panel C: Album 3 (Focus on Nature/Organic Textures).
Panel D: Album 4 (Focus on Light/Color).
5. Lighting & Atmosphere:
Concert Lighting: Each box is lit like a stage show. Spotlights, laser beams, and stage haze.
Depth: Shallow depth of field (Tilt-Shift) to make the vinyl record look massive.
Background: Seamless Slate Grey to keep the focus on the colors.
Output: 2x2 Grid, Hyper-Realistic Miniature Set Design, 8k Resolution, "Audiophile" Aesthetic.
title: Music Curation: Audio-Visual Dioramas for Pink Floyd Fans
description: A complex, multi-step prompt designed to act as a Music Historian and Set Designer. It analyzes the sonic signature of a given band (defaulting to Pink Floyd) and generates four hyper-realistic, miniature 2x2 grid dioramas representing 'hidden gem' albums from other bands, translating their sound into physical, surreal architecture built on spinning vinyl records.

content:
A colossal, photorealistic studio shot centered on the phrase **"{argument name="phrase" default="LAY THE SMACKDOWN"}**" meticulously constructed as a three-dimensional sculpture. The letters are built entirely from precision-machined, miniature fitness equipment: polished chrome dumbbells, textured black cast-iron kettlebells, and deeply etched micro-weight plates. The sculpture exhibits extreme detail, showing fingerprints on the polished metal and subtle chalk dust on the iron components.

Standing just behind the sculpture is Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson, captured mid-pose, radiating immense confidence. He is wearing a tailored, deep black suit jacket over a high-neck fitted t-shirt, emphasizing his physique. His gaze is intense, directed slightly off-camera.

**Visual Style:** High-contrast cinematic studio photography, resembling a blockbuster movie title card. Deep saturation, razor sharpness, and immense texture across all surfaces.

**Setting and Lighting:** Set against a monolithic, seamless matte black backdrop. The scene is illuminated by dramatic, controlled studio lighting. Hard, focused key light highlights the chrome surfaces with brilliant specular reflection. A powerful amber-orange rim light defines Johnson's outline and separates the sculpture from the darkness, creating a sense of heat and power. Subtle atmospheric haze enhances the volumetric lighting effects.

**Camera Settings:** Shot on Hasselblad X2D, 85mm prime lens. Aperture f/2.0. Extremely shallow depth of field (DoF) isolating the foreground text and the subject. Cinematic color grade, ultra-detailed texture mapping.

**Aspect Ratio:** --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6.0

content:
Do this for {argument name="city" default="New York"}: System Instruction:
Generate a hyper-realistic 3D architectural typography render. The letters must act as massive, hollow containers housing a "Micro-World" that semantically matches the Input Word.
1. Semantic Inference (The Blueprint):
Analyze the Input Word to determine the Biome, Material, and Lighting:
If Organic (e.g., JUNGLE, LIFE): Material = Glass & Wood. Interior = Vines, Waterfalls, Trees. Light = Sunlight/Green.
If Urban (e.g., CITY, NYC): Material = Steel & Concrete. Interior = Skyscrapers, Traffic, Streetlights. Light = Amber/Blue.
If Industrial (e.g., FACTORY, RUST): Material = Rusted Iron & Mesh. Interior = Pipes, Steam, Gears. Light = Orange Furnace glow.
If Abstract (e.g., LOVE, HOPE): Material = Gold or White Marble. Interior = Floating petals, soft clouds, candles. Light = Soft Pink/Gold.
2. The Immutable Container (The Mega-Letters):
Geometry: Massive, blocky sans-serif typography.
The Shell: The letterforms are Hollow Containers with open faces or glass walls. They act like terrariums or shadow boxes.
The Base: The letters rest on a surface relevant to the theme (e.g., A map for Cities; Moss for Nature; Blueprint for Industry).
3. The Internal Ecosystem (The Diorama):
CRITICAL: The "World" lives inside the negative space of the letters.
The Density: Fill the interior volume with thousands of tiny details (Micro-Scale).
Example: If "TOKYO," tiny neon signs, vending machines, and pedestrians fill the inside of the "T".
The Verticality: Use the height of the letters. Elevators, vines, or ladders should climb up the vertical strokes.
4. Visual Syntax:
Scale: Tilt-Shift Focus. Blur the background to make the letters look like tangible miniature models.
Detail: High-frequency textures. We need to see individual leaves, bricks, or rivets.
5. Lighting:
Internal Glow: The letters are lit from within by the bioluminescence or streetlights of the micro-world.
External Sun: A soft studio key light highlights the rim of the letter casing.
Output: 3D Render, Octane/Redshift, "Micro-World" Aesthetic, 8k Resolution.
title: Architectural Typography Micro-World Render Prompt (New York)
description: A complex system instruction prompt for Nano Banana Pro to generate a hyper-realistic 3D architectural typography render. The prompt defines rules for creating massive, hollow letters (like 'New York') that act as containers for a 'Micro-World' ecosystem semantically matching the input word, using specific materials, lighting, and a tilt-shift focus.

content:
[PERSON NAME].
Act as a high-end sports graphic designer creating a conceptual tribute poster. The style is a complex "dual exposure photo-grid composite" with mixed-media textures.
CENTRAL STRUCTURE (THE VESSEL):
The central focus is a large-scale, high-contrast black and white portrait silhouette of {argument name="person name" default="[PERSON NAME]"}. This main portrait acts as the container.
THE GRID FILL & TEXTURES (MIXED MEDIA):
The interior of the silhouette is populated by a dense "photo mosaic grid" of action shots from the person's career.
CRITICAL TEXTURE INSTRUCTION: Do not just paste flat photos. Apply artistic textures to various grid cells to create a tactile, collage feel. Use effects like:
Halftone Dots: Comic-book style raster patterns on some cells.
Fabric/Embroidery: Subtle thread or canvas textures suggesting a jersey or patch.
Film Grain: Heavy noise on specific high-contrast action shots.
COLOR STRATEGY:
The base is Monochrome B&W. Use selective color overlays (relevant to the team/flag) ONLY on specific grid cells to create a rhythm.
TYPOGRAPHY & BRANDING (STRICT MICRO-SCALING):
Top Left (The Name): Write "{argument name="person name 2" default="[PERSON NAME]"}" strictly using the font Inter Semibold.
Kerning: Tight negative kerning (-4%).
Size: SMALL and discreet. It must occupy MAXIMUM 20% of the canvas width. Do NOT make it large or loud.
Top Right (The Symbol): Place the primary logo (Team/Brand/Flag).
Size: VERY SMALL. It must occupy MAXIMUM 10% of the canvas width.
COMPOSITION & BACKGROUND:
Background: Off-white or light grey with a visible high-quality paper or concrete texture. It should not be flat digital white.
Alignment: Center the figure perfectly. Maintain wide negative space around the object.
title: High-End Sports Graphic Poster Template
description: A complex prompt template for generating a high-end sports graphic poster. It uses a dual-exposure photo-grid composite style, where a large black and white portrait silhouette of a person acts as a container filled with a mosaic of career action shots, incorporating mixed-media textures like halftone dots and fabric.

content:
DIRECTIVE:
Generate a high-end, vertical format Movie Poster. Act as an expert Art Director and execute the following prompt based strictly on the defined INPUT VARIABLES and any ATTACHED IMAGES.

INPUT VARIABLES (FILL THESE OUT):
{VAR_TITLE}: [{argument name="movie title" default="INSERT MOVIE TITLE HERE"}]

{VAR_CREATOR}: [{argument name="creator name" default="INSERT CREATOR/DIRECTOR NAME HERE"}]

{VAR_STYLE}: [{argument name="genre or art style" default="INSERT GENRE OR ART STYLE HERE"}]

{VAR_PALETTE}: [{argument name="color palette" default="INSERT COLOR PALETTE HERE"}]

EXECUTION PLAN:

SUBJECT & REFERENCE HANDLING (CONDITIONAL LOGIC):

IF IMAGES ARE ATTACHED: You must use the attached images as the primary visual reference. The protagonist on the poster must STRICTLY maintain the facial features, likeness, and physical attributes of the reference images.

IF NO IMAGES ARE ATTACHED: You have full creative freedom to design an original protagonist that perfectly fits the {VAR_STYLE} and the {VAR_CREATOR} aesthetic.

ARTISTIC DIRECTION:

Visual Style: Render the entire image in the specific style of {VAR_STYLE}.

Signature Look: Apply the directorial techniques associated with {VAR_CREATOR} (like signature camera angles, lighting choices, or visual composition habits).

Color Grading: The whole vibe, lighting, and shadows should be fully driven by the {VAR_PALETTE}. Go for high contrast and make sure the mood matches the color palette.

TYPOGRAPHY & LAYOUT:

Title: Display the text "{VAR_TITLE}" front and center (top or bottom placement).

Font: Pick a typeface that fits both the {VAR_STYLE} and the feel of {VAR_CREATOR}.

Poster Elements: Add a subtle billing block (credits) at the bottom to keep it realistic.

TECHNICAL SPECS:

Aspect Ratio: Vertical (9:16 or 2:3)

Resolution: 8K, ultra-detailed

Finish: Commercial print quality, sharp subject focus, cinematic depth of field
title: Parametrized Movie Poster Generation Prompt
description: An analytical and highly structured prompt template for generating a high-end, vertical movie poster. It uses input variables for the title, creator, style, and color palette, with conditional logic to handle reference images for character likeness, ensuring a specific artistic and technical execution.

content:
Ultimate Integrated Prompt - 'British Vogue' Fashion Magazine Cover Edition
Reference Image 1 Look Ã— Reference Image 2 High-End Gentleman Aesthetic

[Core Directive]
As a world-class fashion photographer (Steven Meisel/Paolo Roversi/Peter Lindbergh), create a high-end fashion portrait suitable for the cover style of 'British Vogue' for **[the person in Reference Image 1]**.
Four Core Requirements:

1. Strictly reproduce 100% of the external features of the person in Reference Image 1 (hair style, facial contours, features, age perception, body type, etc.) (without any pre-settings or assumptions).
2. Transformation of dignified elegance (The original temperament of the person in Reference Figure 1 â†’ transformed into the aura of a relaxed, high-end fashion gentleman).
3. Fully incorporate the visual DNA of Reference Figure 2 (seated posture with hand supporting the cheek, fine pinstripe suit, folding chair, pure white background, monochrome tone, relaxed and sophisticated atmosphere).
4. Allow creative fine-tuning (flexible adjustments permitted while maintaining the core aesthetic).

[I. Subject Appearance Reproduction - Reference Figure 1]
âœ… Absolute Principle: Reproduce Reference Figure 1 100%
Features that must be completely retained:

Hair style: Hair length, color, style, curl degree, hairline, volume, etc. - Complete match
Face shape: Contour, width, jawline, facial proportions - Complete retention
Five senses: Shape, size, position, and proportion of eyes, nose, lips, ears - Complete match
Skin: Skin color, texture, moles, scars, blemishes, etc. - Complete retention
Age characteristics: Wrinkles, fine lines, under-eye bags, nasolabial folds, etc. - Realistically reproduced
Body type: Proportion, shoulder width, overall physique - Complete retention
Unique characteristics: Individual specific facial or physical characteristics

âŒ Absolute Prohibitions:

No external feature of Reference Image 1 shall be altered
Reference Image 1 features shall not be 'optimized' or 'beautified'
No pre-setting or assumption of how Reference Image 1 should look
Reference Image 1's appearance shall not be changed due to the style of Reference Image 2

âœ… Verification Criteria:

Viewers who know the person in Reference Figure 1 must instantly recognize them as the same person
Facial feature similarity must be 95% or higher
Failure if pointed out that the image does not resemble Reference Figure 1

[II. Expression and Atmosphere - Dignified and Relaxed Gentleman]
Direction of Atmosphere Transformation:
Core Emotional Keywords:

'Relaxed confidence'
'Sophistication in idleness'
'Subtle high-end feel'
'Artistic distance'
'The composure of a fashionable gentleman'

Facial Expression (Reference Figure 2 style):
Gaze:

âœ… Slightly raise the gaze and look straight at the camera

A gentle yet sharp gaze
Conveying 'I am relaxed, but aware of my charm'
An observant eye with artistic distance
Not exaggerated, effortless, and not flattering

Mouth:

âœ… Lightly tighten the corners of the mouth or close naturally

No smiling, not serious
A completely relaxed, natural state
Conveying 'subtle sophistication'
Slightly pursing the lips is also an option (restrained elegance)

Overall Facial Impression:

âœ… Completely relax the facial muscles

No tension or deliberate movement whatsoever
Natural, relaxed, and composed state
Conveying the message 'I don't need to prove anything'

âœ… Naturally express skin texture

Realistic texture while applying moderate correction
High-end and refined, but authentic texture

Emotional Guidance by Director:

'You are the person on the cover of Vogue. You are very relaxed.'
'You are not posing; you are just sitting here.'
'Your languor is real, not an act.'
'Fashion is about relaxing, not striving.'

[III. Core Pose - Seated Posture with Hand Supporting Cheek (Reference Figure 2 Standard Pose)]
Iconic Pose:
Sitting on a folding chair:

âœ… Sitting Style:

Sitting on a simple metal folding chair
Body slightly leaning forward or naturally upright
Legs naturally spread (shoulder-width or slightly wider)
Both feet placed flat on the ground

Hand Posture (Core Feature):

âœ… Supporting the cheek with one hand (Refer to Figure 2 standard):

Place the elbow of the right or left hand on the thigh of the same side
Support the chin/cheek with the palm or fingers
An impression of sophistication despite appearing casual
Expressing a state of 'contemplation' or 'leisurely waiting'

âœ… The other hand:

Naturally placed on the backrest/armrest of the chair
Or naturally hanging down
Or lightly placed on the opposite thigh

Significance of Posture:

Breaking the formality of stiffness
Creating a fashionable look of 'relaxed high-end feel'
Conveying the message 'Thinking about art/life'
Everyday object (folding chair) + High-end styling = Contrast aesthetic

Body Posture:

Relax the shoulders (do not raise them)
Naturally curve the spine (do not stiffen)
Overall conveying comfort, naturalness, and composure

Head Posture:

Head slightly turned sideways (5-15 degrees)
Or facing the camera straight on
Naturally tilted according to the position of the hand supporting the cheek

[IV. Styling Design - High-End Fashion Formal]
Attire (Refined Formal + Relaxed Details):
Core Item - Fine Pinstripe Suit (Reference Figure 2 Standard):

âœ… Jacket:

Fine pinstripe in a {argument name="suit color" default="dark color"} (black/dark gray/navy)
Slim fit or standard silhouette
Double-breasted or single-breasted
Lapels are sharp, shoulder line is crisp

âœ… Trousers:

Fine pinstripe of the same pattern as the jacket
High waist, slim fit or straight
Cuffed hem (Refer to Figure 2 important detail)

Cuff the hem 1-2 times
Exposing the ankles and socks
Softening the formality and adding a relaxed fashion feel

âœ… Shirt:

White formal shirt
Collar neatly arranged, buttons fastened to the top or slightly loosened
Shirt cuffs visible 1-2 cm from the suit sleeves

Shoes and Socks:

âœ… Black glossy leather shoes

Derby shoes or Oxford shoes
Highly polished, sharp reflection

âœ… Black long socks (Refer to Figure 2 feature)

Clearly visible due to the cuffed hem
Solid color or fine stripe

Overall Style:

'High-end bespoke suit + relaxed fashionable details'
'Freedom within rigor'
'Refined but not stiff'

Accessories (Refined Details):
1. Thin-frame glasses (Recommended):

âœ… Thin metal frame (gold/silver/black)
âœ… Square or round frame
âœ… Clear lenses
âœ… Adds an 'intellectual fashion' atmosphere

2. Watch:

âœ… Meta

content: Create a historical diagram-style infographic, 16:9 horizontal composition, titled "Visual Deconstruction of the Ancient Chinese Official Attire Ranking System." Adopt the aesthetic of ancient canonical diagrams and draw in the style of illustrations from ancient books. The image should display a comparison of the official uniforms of nine ranks of officials from the {argument name="dynasty" default="Qing Dynasty"}, arranged from left to right by rank: nine standing figures from the first to the ninth rank. Above each figure, use fine-line painting (Gongbi) to label the "Buzi (Rank Badge) Pattern" (First Rank Crane, Second Rank Golden Pheasant, Third Rank Peacock... Ninth Rank Quail; civil officials use flying birds, military officials use fierce beasts), with a close-up magnifying glass effect highlighting the embroidery details of the Buzi. Below the figures, label the "Chaozhu (Court Bead) Material" (First Rank Eastern Pearl, Second Rank Coral, Third Rank Sapphire... decreasing by rank), "Dingdai Hualing (Hat Ornament)" (Ruby/Coral/Sapphire/Crystal, etc., distinguished by color blocks), and "Mangpao (Dragon Robe) Pattern" (Nine Dragons/Five Claws/Four Claws, using diagrams to illustrate the difference in claw count). The top of the image features a "Rank Identification Quick Reference Chart": a table comparing the differences across 5 dimensions (Buzi, Dingdai, Chaozhu, Mangpao, Waist Belt) for all 9 ranks, with each cell marked by a small icon and text. The bottom of the image features "Historical Trivia": labeling "Why civil officials used flying birds and military officials used fierce beasts" (civil service requires soaring high, military service requires bravery), "The political meaning of the Hualing" (being granted a Hualing signifies imperial favor), and "Color Restrictions" (commoners were forbidden from wearing yellow or bright yellow). The very bottom includes a timeline showing the "Evolution of Official Attire through Dynasties": thumbnail sketches illustrating the style changes from the Han, Tang, Song, Yuan, Ming, and Qing dynasties. All text must be in Chinese: the top title uses the Small Seal Script font "Official Attire Rank Diagram: The Power Code Worn on the Body," and the bottom caption states "The clothing system is the visual representation of the feudal hierarchy." Use traditional official attire colors for the palette. The overall presentation should focus on historical institutions and clothing culture, suitable for historical education and cultural research.
title: Visual Infographic of Ancient Chinese Official Ranks and Attire
description: This is a detailed, historical infographic prompt designed to visualize and break down the ranking system of official attire in ancient China, specifically focusing on the Qing Dynasty. It requests a 16:9 horizontal composition in the style of ancient historical diagrams and illustrated books, comparing the uniforms of nine officials from the first to the ninth rank. The prompt specifies detailed elements like the embroidered rank badges (Buzi), court beads (Chaozhu), hat ornaments (Dingdai Hualing), and dragon robes (Mangpao), along with explanatory tables and historical context, making it suitable for educational content on Chinese history and culture.

meta:

canvas:

style:

composition:

    overlay: "very subtle snow/bokeh particles mainly over photo area (keep right area clean)"
  divider_splitter:
    shape: "thin smooth curved band near the boundary of photo/white"
    thickness: "5â€“7% of canvas height"
    fill_gradient: { from: "#083D57", to: "#0E7890" }
    optional_rim:
      enabled: true
      thickness: "1â€“2% of canvas height"
      fill_gradient: { from: "#EAF2F6", to: "#FFFFFF" }
    flat_rules:
      - "no 3D, no bevel, no inner shadow, no glass, no facets, no specular"
  bottom_waves:
    coverage: "bottom 22â€“28% of canvas"
    layers:
      - { gradient: { from: "#083D57", to: "#0B2433" }, opacity: 1.0 }
      - { gradient: { from: "#0E7890", to: "#6A90A0" }, opacity: 0.55 }
      - { gradient: { from: "#EAF2F6", to: "#FFFFFF" }, opacity: 0.45 }
    rule: "flat premium (no facets/bevel), minimal noise only to prevent banding"

content:
You are an **architect and concept artist who visualizes story structures**.
Analyze the provided input text (the movie synopsis) and generate a **"Vertical Layered Diorama"** where the height direction represents the timeline.

The character in the attached reference image should be placed in the "Present (Middle Layer)" or "Future (Top Layer)" of this vertical structure, acting as the **storyteller/time traveler**, and posed to **look down on the past / look up at the future**.

---

## â–¼ Instructions for Generation Process (Nano Banana Pro: Thinking Mode)

1. **[Step 1: Timeline Mapping]**: Decompose the synopsis into three time phases and assign them to physical layers.

   * **Bottom Layer (Past/Origin)**: Cause of gravity collapse, sealing, deep underground. Dark and heavy tone.
   * **Middle Layer (Present/Conflict)**: Survival and conflict in gravity-broken Tokyo. Vivid and dynamic tone.
   * **Top Layer (Future/Conclusion)**: Birth of a new gravity order, hope or ruin. Open and symbolic tone.
2. **[Step 2: Connection Design]**: Design the layers so they are not disconnected, but physically connected by elements such as **Gravity Well pillars / inverted spiral staircases / magnetic elevators / waterfalls where falling turns into rising**.
3. **[Step 3: Text Integration]**: Place the movie title in a stable location at the very top or bottom, and engrave famous lines on the **layer boundaries**.

---

## â–¼ Design and Style Specification

* **Composition/Layout**: **Vertical Cross-section / Tower structure**. Aspect ratio is vertical (**9:16**). Viewpoint is **slightly above the front**, at an angle that shows the thickness and depth of the layers.
* **Taste**: **Precise museum model, geological cross-section, surreal architecture**. Express different eras and materials in each layer (concrete â†’ neon metal â†’ white structure on clouds) while integrating them as one giant object.
* **Texture/Image Quality**: Photorealistic, precise detail, **8k**. Raindrops, wet asphalt, reflections, fog, volumetric light.
* **Gravity Expression (Important)**:

  * Tokyo roads **curve 90 degrees as a continuous surface**, where the ground becomes a wall, and then arches to the ceiling, connecting in a **loop**.
  * Buildings, signs, cars, and pipes **protrude vertically** from the curved surface, and landmarks exist **upside down** suspended in the air.
  * Depict as a **physically continuous urban structure**, not just a reflection.
  * Light sources match the reality of a rainy night (reflections of neon and streetlights, diffused light through clouds).

---

## â–¼ Input Text (Fictional Movie)

**Title**: **{argument name="Movie Title" default="GRAVITY BROKEN TOKYO (Gravity Fault City Tokyo)"}**
**Genre**: Sci-Fi Thriller / Disaster / Human Drama

**Synopsis**:
One night, due to the fracture of the "Gravity Lattice" above Tokyo, the city's gravity lost its uniformity. Roads bend into the sky, buildings lose their up and down, and falling chooses a direction. People survive by redefining "where the ground is." The narrator (reference character) dives across time to the origin of the gravity collapse, struggles in the current city, and reaches the new order of the future.

### [Bottom Layer / Past and Origin] (PHASE 1: YEAR 2036)

* **Setting**: Deep underground research complex. Black basalt-like strata, old wiring, gravity control reactor "Atlas Core."
* **Description**: Suggests that the device meant to "fix" gravity instead triggered the "tearing" of gravity. Tools and paper documents are scattered on the floor, and water droplets float horizontally due to gravity disturbances.
* **Tone**: Dark, oppressive. Warning lights, fine dust, the stillness of low gravity.

### [Middle Layer / Present and Conflict] (PHASE 2: YEAR 2046)

* **Setting**: The center of gravity-broken Tokyo, where rain continues to fall. A continuous city where **wet asphalt curves 90 degrees, becoming a wall, and continuing to the ceiling**.
* **Description (Reflecting Gravity Prompt)**:

  * Roads rise vertically and then arch overhead to loop.
  * Landmarks are suspended upside down, and road signs protrude into the air.
  * Neon lights bleed along the curved surfaces in the fog and light rain, and reflections establish the light of a real rainy night.
* **Character Placement**: Place the reference character in the **"Present" of the Middle Layer**. Grasping a railing or pipe with one hand, pointing to the light of the upper layer with the other. Gaze **looking down on the past (bottom layer) while looking up at the future (top layer)**.
* **Tone**: Dynamic, tense. People's evacuation routes continue along the "wall roads."

### [Top Layer / Future and Conclusion] (PHASE 3: YEAR 2058)

* **Setting**: The "Stable Gravity Layer" above the clouds. City remnants are rearranged, forming a new residential area composed of white frame structures and transparent materials.
* **Description**: Ambiguous whether the gravity lattice was "repaired" or if a "new direction" was accepted. A pale column of light from the gravity well extends into the sky, connecting to the darkness below.
* **Tone**: Open and symbolic. Hope and unease coexist.

---

## â–¼ Connection Points (Gimmicks connecting the layers: Required)

* **Gravity Well Light Column**: A column of pale blue volumetric light penetrating from the core of the bottom layer to the top layer. Particles flow upward.
* **Inverted Spiral Staircase**: "Up" and "down" switch midway. Small year plates on the staircase railing.
* **Waterfall where Falling Turns into Rising**: The water flow reverses at the boundary, emphasizing the layer separation.

---

## â–¼ Visual Elements (Motifs to emphasize)

* Wet asphalt, trajectory of raindrops, neon reflections, fog, volumetric light.
* Curved City: Roads, architecture, and signs bend as a **continuous surface**, forming a **physical loop**.
* Small objects floating in the air (umbrellas, paper scraps, tools, petals) visualize the disturbance in the direction of gravity.
* Material changes in each layer: Rough rock stratum underground â†’ Wet concrete and metal in the present â†’ White structure and transparent material in the future.

---

## â–¼ Text Instructions (On-screen Typography)

* **Title**: "**{argument name="Title" default="GRAVITY BROKEN TOKYO"}**"

  * Placement: **Sky of the Top Layer**, or engraved on the pedestal of the bottom layer.
  * Font: Inorganic sans-serif, movie poster style.
* **Famous Line** (Engrave on layer boundaries):

  * `{argument name="Famous Line" default=""Where is down, when the world forgets gravity?""}`
  * Placement: **Boundary between Middle and Top Layers**, like a sculpture on the landing of the inverted staircase or the edge of the light column.
* **Timeline Display (Optional)**: Small next to each layer

  * `PHASE 1 / YEAR 2036`
  * `PHASE 2 / YEAR 2046`
  * `PHAS

content:
Do this for {argument name="City/Year A vs. City/Year B" default="New York 1700 vs New York 2025"}

<instructions>
Input Variable: [City/Year A vs. City/Year B] (e.g., New York 1900 vs. New York 2025)

System Instruction:
Generate a photorealistic, isometric macro render of a split-era urban diorama. The goal is Historical and Municipal Accuracy, avoiding sci-fi tropes or idealization.

1. Temporal Forensic Analysis:
Analyze the Dates:
 Strictly adhere to the architectural technologies available in Year A versus Year B.
The Left Block (The Past): Construct the Left side using the dominant vernacular of the era.
For 1900: Beaux-Arts stone, brick tenements, water towers, external fire escapes, and cobblestone/early asphalt.
The Right Block (The Present/Future): Construct the Right side using current urban realities, not futuristic fantasies.
For 2025: Prioritize "Super-Slender" Pencil Towers (Billionaire's Row style), Glass Curtain Walls mixed with preserved older facades, and "Hudson Yards" style angled steel.
  Crucial Detail: If the year is modern (2020+), you MUST include Urban Clutter: Green construction plywood barriers, sidewalk scaffolding (sheds), steam vents, and delivery trucks.

2. The Container (The Cross-Section):
The Base: Two suspended chunks of city infrastructure, revealing the "Underground" layer on the side profile.
Left Underground: Brick sewers and early subway tunnels.
Right Underground: Concrete conduit banks, fiber optic lines, and modern subway tiles.
The Divider: A jagged timeline fracture. No glowing sci-fi energy. The divide is a stark cut in the asphalt.

3. The Composition (The Density):
Left Street Life: Period-accurate transport (Horse-drawn carriages mixed with early Model T Fords or Trolleys). Pedestrians in dark coats/hats.
Right Street Life: Municipal Realism. Yellow Taxis, Amazon delivery vans, Uber cars, and bike lanes with cyclists. The street level should feel congested and chaotic.
Vegetation: Left has Elm trees (if applicable); Right has manicured "Corporate Plaza" planters and rooftop gardens.

4. Accurate Lighting Simulation (No "Neon Filters"):
Left Lighting: Carbon-Arc and Gaslight. The light should be dim, patchy, and warm (2400K), casting long shadows.
 Right Lighting: Mixed Municipal Lighting. A chaotic mix of warm sodium streetlights (orange), harsh white LED construction lights (6000K), and internal office lighting (neutral). Do not use "Cyberpunk Blue" or "Purple" unless it is a specific billboard.
Atmosphere: The Left is hazy from coal smoke. The Right has a clearer, sharper air quality but with light pollution.

5. Visual Syntax:
Camera: Isometric Orthographic projection, 45-degree angle.
Render Style: Photorealistic Architectural Visualization (ArchViz), 8k, V-Ray Render. Focus on texture fidelity (rust, wet pavement, grime) rather than bloom effects.

Output: 1:1 Aspect Ratio, Extreme Detail, Historically Authentic.
title: Split-Era Urban Diorama Generation Prompt for Nano Banana Pro
description: This is a highly detailed, multi-section system instruction designed for the Nano Banana Pro model to generate a photorealistic, isometric macro render of a split-era urban diorama. The prompt focuses on achieving Historical and Municipal Accuracy by contrasting two different time periods within the same city block, specifically detailing architectural styles, urban clutter, lighting, and composition for a realistic comparison.

A woman with a mysterious Gothic Ethereal appearance.
 
Face: Pale skin with subtle freckles clearly visible across the nose and cheeks. Her expression is calm yet holds sorrow (melancholic).
 
Hair: Thick, jet-black hair that is tousled and blown by strong wind. Strands of hair cover parts of her face and eyes, creating a dramatic and wild impression.
 
Eyes & Lips: Deep, wistful gaze. Her lips are a muted dark red shade, looking natural yet bold.
 
Clothing & Style
Attire: Wearing a black Victorian/Gothic style gown with a ruffled high-neck. The fabric texture appears heavy and premium, like dark velvet or wool.
 
Aura: The overall style creates an impression of "Dark Magical" or a poetic modern sorceress.
 
Background & Atmosphere
Setting: Outdoors at night or very dark dusk. The background is a heavily blurred forest or trees (bokeh).
 
Weather Effects: Fine snowflakes or dust particles float in the air, adding a cold and quiet feel.
 
Lighting: Very low key lighting with high contrast. Light is only focused on the facial area, while other parts are submerged in deep shadow.
 
Visual Techniques
Color: Desaturated (almost monochromatic) color palette dominated by black, dark gray, and subtle cool skin tones.
 
Composition: Close-up shot (chest-up portrait) with sharp focus on hair and skin textures, while the background is kept extremely soft to make the subject stand out.
 
Art Style: Cinematic, poetic, and artistic, resembling a fantasy horror movie poster or dark academia novel cover.
 
Do not alter her face.

A weathered â€œWANTEDâ€ poster is partially visible behind her head, adding a gritty, outlaw atmosphere. She is leaning back casually with her arms crossed, projecting a mischievous, dangerous confidence. She has very pale, porcelain skin and striking light-colored eyes, enhanced with bold, smudged eye makeup-one eye accented with dark eyeliner and the other with a bluish shadow. A small heart-shaped face marking sits just beneath one eye. Her lips are painted a deep red, forming a playful yet sinister smirk. Her platinum-blonde hair is styled into high twin pigtails, with the ends dyed in contrasting pastel tones-one side faded pink and the other teal blue. Loose strands frame her face, adding a messy, chaotic charm. She wears a distressed, torn, fitted white T-shirt with faded red sleeves and a grungy printed slogan across the chest. The shirt appears worn and dirty, with frayed edges and holes, emphasizing a raw, post-apocalyptic or urban-crime aesthetic. Leather straps and suspenders rest over her shoulders. Her arms are decorated with tattoos in bold, sketchy lettering and symbols, and she wears chunky metal bracelets and cuffs on her wrists. A thick metallic choker encircles her neck. Around her waist is a

studded belt, contributing to the punk-rock vibe. The lighting is moody and directional, highlighting facial contours and textures while casting soft shadows for depth. The color palette is muted and gritty, with desaturated grays and earthy tones contrasted by the vibrant pastel hair colors and red accents. The overall style is hyper-realistic, cinematic, edgy, and dark, with a high level of texture detail-skin pores, fabric wear, cracks, and paper creases all clearly visible.

content:
Character Name: [Set {argument name="character name" default="character name"} here]

Advertisement/Poster/Promotional Key Visual Generation Prompt
The primary purpose of this prompt is to generate a key visual for advertisements, posters, and promotional materials for high-end department stores, luxury restaurants, and limited sales, specifically featuring **"photorealistic images of Osechi dishes."**
The generated image must prioritize the following:

Completeness recognized instantly as an "advertisement."
The Osechi is the "main product," strongly boosted by the tiered structure, menu, world view, and character elements.

Overall Visual Premise (Advertising Declaration | Boost Design)
This key visual is based on an advertising design where the direction of expression changes significantly, starting from the characteristics of the reference image. This prompt does not aim for a stable solution but extracts the strongest element (luxury, strangeness, humor, specialty, etc.) from the reference image's intensity, boosting the entire advertising expression through high-quality, high-sense, and outrageously genius representation. The direction is automatically determined by the impression of the reference image. However, regardless of the direction, the image must be conscious of being an "advertisement that works in a department store's New Year's sales area." This boost result is consistently reflected and visualized in all subsequent composition, tiered structure, copy, and menu details.
Scene/Moment (The Instant Captured for the Advertisement)
Automatically select the moment that conveys the highest appeal as an advertisement and instantly communicates "what kind of existence" the Osechi is. This prompt does not fixate on a specific production pattern; the "instant captured" is defined as the state among the tiered box, food, structure, and world view that maximizes information density and narrative potential.
The tiered box may be closed or open.
The entire dish may be visible, or only a part may be emphasized.
Time is not fixed (just before, just after, or during movement).
It must be a high-quality, high-sense, and uniquely captivating Osechi that instantly grabs attention, and the optimal structure, angle, and state are automatically selected for this purpose.
Composition/Shooting Style (Advertising Layout Premise)
Place the Osechi tiered box in the center or slightly foreground of the screen.
High-end food advertisement angle, from the front to slightly diagonally above.
Intentional negative space for placing copy and menu details.
Technical Requirements:
8K resolution
Hyper-realistic food photography
Department store/luxury restaurant advertisement quality
Packaging/Tiered Box Design
The tiered box is designed as the **"outer shell" that most purely reflects the characteristics of the reference image.** The basic structure starts with a "tiered box suitable for supervision by a department store or long-established store," but it changes freely, becoming high-quality, high-sense, and bizarre, depending on the impression of the reference image.
Osechi Body (Product Persuasiveness)
The food composition is not limited to "Japanese" but is designed as a celebratory dish freely expanded based on the individuality of the reference image.

Character Expression (Edible Celebration World)
All characters are entities composed of food ingredients, exaggerating the characteristics of the reference image and reinterpreted into New Year's costumes matching the concept.
Although the materials are food, priority is given to expressions that make them feel as if they are breathing, moving, and vibrant in that world.
The characters are not treated as "creations" but as beings that have existed in the Osechi world from the beginning.
Color Design
Color rules are not fixed but automatically determined as the optimal solution derived from the reference image and concept.
The food, tiered box, characters, and background establish luxury and festivity through texture, density, and contrast, rather than color.
Advertising Copy/Menu Design (Most Important)
Copy and menu details naturally arise as a result of verbalizing the characteristics and concept of the reference image.
Text is placed on the screen as a "visual element intended to evoke a feeling instantly."
The menu details are a list of dish names that cleverly twist the characteristics of the reference image with high-sense and intense humor.
The {argument name="year" default="2026"} year display, selection concept, official seal, and main price are placed in effective positions using high-sense, high-quality, ultra-unique, and genius decorative text that matches the concept.
Variation Display (For Advertisement)
Display Single-tier/Two-tier/Three-tier in a wipe-style.
Small frame + item name + price.
Size that does not interfere with the main tiered box.
Background/Lighting
Based on soft New Year's light, but arranged according to the characteristics of the reference image.
Maximize the luster of lacquer, gold leaf, and food ingredients.
Final Tone (Output Guideline)
An advertising visual that seems genuinely for sale but transcends realityâ€”where celebration and strangeness arise simultaneously.

content:
Prompt 1:
"Create a vertical, photorealistic New Year 2026 portrait set in Paris during winter, framed like a vintage New Year postcard. Preserve the exact identity of the subject or subjects with zero beautification or facial alteration, maintaining natural expressions, facial proportions, realistic skin texture, and true age.
Place the person on an authentic Parisian street with the Eiffel Tower clearly visible in the mid-background, softly glowing, instantly recognizable and naturally scaled (not oversized). Include classic Paris elements such as cafÃ© terraces, warm street lamps, stone pavement, and subtle New Year dÃ©cor like elegant lights, minimal garlands, or soft celebratory accents (no Christmas symbols). Dress the subject in natural winter outfits-stylish coats, scarves, and soft neutral layers suitable for late December, styled realistically and cohesively. Add gentle snowfall with small visible flakes, combining cool winter tones with warm golden street-lamp highlights to create a festive yet realistic New Year atmosphere. The lighting should feel cinematic but natural.
Apply subtle film grain, slight softness, and muted contrast to evoke a nostalgic printed photograph, not a modern digital look.
Frame the image with a tasteful aged postcard-style border. At the bottom, include elegant handwritten-style text reading exactly: "{argument name="postcard text" default="Happy New Year 2026"}"
The final image should feel warm, joyful, authentic, and celebratory, like a real moment captured during a New Year holiday trip-festive without appearing staged or artificial."

Prompt 2:
"A high-resolution photorealistic studio fashion portrait of an adult woman(match face) with long light brown hair with golden blonde highlights styled in loose curls, wearing a gold shimmering party hat. She wears a shimmering gold sequin party dress with a modern asymmetric cutout at the neckline.

The woman holds gold foil balloons shaped as the numbers 20 and 26 one in each hand, slightly raised near her shoulders. She looks off to the side with a playful, cheeky expression, lips pursed as if making a "thinking" face.
Neutral beige backdrop, clean studio environment, soft shadowing behind her. The balloons have realistic creases, highlights, and metallic shine.
Skin texture, hair strands, and sequins are sharply detailed.
No visible text or branding. Editorial-quality realism."
title: New Year 2026 Postcard and Studio Portrait Prompts
description: Two detailed prompts for New Year 2026 celebrations. Prompt 1 generates a nostalgic, photorealistic vertical postcard scene in Paris, emphasizing identity preservation and natural winter styling. Prompt 2 creates a high-resolution studio fashion portrait with gold party elements and specific posing.

content:
I. Theme and Emotion
1 Festive Theme: A fresh studio portrait celebrating the arrival of 2026, sweet, cute, relaxed, and playful.
2 Visual Temperament: Extreme minimalism (negative space), fashion editorial feel, clean, bright, gentle, and restrained.

II. Composition and Perspective
1 Aspect Ratio: Vertical, subject centered slightly lower, large area above reserved for text elements.
2 Composition Method: Primarily symmetrical and centered, the main subject is fully visible, feet and seat are visible, background negative space emphasizes the theme.
3 Depth of Field: Subject is sharp, background text is blurred to create layers and atmosphere.

III. Character and Pose
1 Character Setting: Young female, translucent and natural skin, light but refined makeup.
2 Expression and Action: Single eye winking, hands cupping the face in a flower-holding gesture, conveying playfulness and approachability.
3 Sitting Posture: Legs together and slightly tucked, body leaning forward slightly, overall line is compact and cute.

IV. Apparel and Styling
1 Main Clothing Color: {argument name="clothing color" default="Positive red"} thick cable-knit long dress or long sweater, covering to the calf, strong festive feel.
2 Accessory Details: Hair is half-up or symmetrically tied, paired with small dark hair accessories, overall simple.
3 Shoes and Socks: White mid-calf socks, black shiny round-toe shallow shoes, emphasizing vintage sweetness.

V. Scene and Props
1 Prop Selection: Transparent acrylic square stool, barely noticeable, enhancing minimalism and transparency.
2 Scene Type: Pure studio background without extra furnishings, emphasizing the subject and text theme.

VI. Background and Text Elements
1 Background Color: Warm light beige or light gray-beige, soft and non-glaring.
2 Text Design: Large handwritten cursive text running through the image. Text content: â€œ{argument name="text content" default="2026 Hello!"}â€
3 Text Function: Serves as a celebratory marker and visual rhythm line, enhancing layers and visual guidance.

VII. Lighting and Color
1 Lighting Style: Soft, uniform high-key studio lighting, very shallow shadows, smooth and three-dimensional facial features.
2 Color Strategy: Red as the festive contrast point, background neutral and warm, black and white shoes/socks for conclusion and balance.
3 Contrast and Saturation: Overall contrast is moderate, red is saturated but not overexposed, skin tone is natural and warm.

VIII. Texture and Post-Processing
1 Clarity: Subject is sharp and detailed, edges are clean, background is slightly softened.
2 Image Cleanliness: Suppress noise andæ‚è‰² (chromatic aberration/æ‚è‰²), maintain pure negative space and high-end feel.
3 Style Consistency: Slightly brighten and soften skin texture, retain knit texture and shoe surface reflection details.

IX. Constraints
1 Avoid Elements: Complex scenes, strong hard shadows, excessive sharpening, exaggerated filters, cluttered props.
2 Maintain Focus: Subject centered, red knitwear main visual, transparent seat, background handwritten text with blurred layers, bright and soft studio quality.

content:
Character Name: {argument name="Character Name" default="[Your Character Name]"}

## Key Visual Generation Prompt for Advertising/Posters/Promotional Materials (Lucky Bag Edition)
### 0. Primary Goal of This Prompt (Highest Priority)
This prompt is intended to generate **"photorealistic images of lucky bags" and key visuals for advertisements, posters, and promotional materials for department stores, specialty shops, and limited sales.**
The generated image must satisfy the following priorities:
* A level of completion that is instantly recognizable as an "advertisement."
* The lucky bag must function as the "main product," while the surrounding contents, world view, and character elements intensely boost anticipation and narrative.
### 1. Overall Premise of the Visual (Advertising Declaration | Boost Design)
This key visual is based on an advertising design where the direction of expression varies greatly, starting from the characteristics of the reference image. Do not aim for a stable solution; instead, extract the strongest element among luxury, excitement, strangeness, humor, chaos, or specialness, and elevate it into a **high-quality, high-sense, and "genius expression that makes you want it even though all the contents are visible."** It is an absolute condition that it functions as an "advertisement valid at a department store's first sale." This boost result is consistently reflected in the composition, placement of contents, product name display, and copy.
### 2. Scene/Moment (The Moment Cut Out for Advertising)
Automatically select the moment that has the highest appeal as an advertisement and instantly conveys "what kind of experience the lucky bag contains."
* The lucky bag may be opened.
* It may be half-open with contents spilling out.
* The contents may be beautifully arranged around the lucky bag.
**In this prompt, the composition with "the lucky bag at the center, with contents spread around it" is prioritized.**
Cut out a state where, upon first glance,
"What's inside?"
"But it's not ordinary."
"I want this."
all arise simultaneously.

### 3. Composition/Shooting Style (Advertising Layout Premise)

* Place the lucky bag in the center to slightly foreground of the screen.
* Frontal to slightly overhead angle suitable for advertising.
* Arrange the contents around the lucky bag in a circular, radial, or floating manner.
* Place product name text near or overlapping each item.

* Ensure intentional negative space for placing copy and year.
**Technical Requirements:**
* 8K resolution
* Ultra-realistic product photo
* Department store advertisement quality
### 4. Lucky Bag Package Design
The lucky bag is designed as the "outer shell" that most purely reflects the characteristics of the reference image.
* Basically, a shape that is valid as a department store, long-established shop, or brand lucky bag.
* Material (paper, cloth, Japanese paper, vinyl, luxury textile, etc.) is free.
* Change freely between luxury/pop/strange/festive/foreign object feeling, depending on the impression of the reference image.

### 5. Contents (Product Persuasiveness)
The contents of the lucky bag are not fixed by genre and are reconstructed based on the reference image and concept.
* Products that seem real.
* Products that are impossible.
* Characterized products.
* Products with strange sizes.
may be mixed.
The important thing is to establish the feeling that **"I can see everything, but it's mysterious and I want it."**

### 6. Character Expression (Inhabitants of the Lucky Bag World)
The character exists naturally within the contents of the lucky bag or the surrounding world.
* May be composed of products.
* May be jumping out of the lucky bag.
* May be in a pose introducing the contents.

Exclude any artificial feeling,

Treat them as "beings who originally live in this lucky bag world."
### 7. Color Scheme
The color rules are not fixed; the optimal solution is automatically selected based on the reference image and concept.
* Express value not through color, but through texture, density, gloss, and information volume.
* The lucky bag, products, characters, and background should not clash, yet be excessively lively.
### 8. Advertising Copy/Product Name Display (Most Important)
Copy and product names naturally arise as a result of verbalizing the reference image and concept.

* Directly display "Product Name Text" next to each item placed around the lucky bag.
* Product names allow for naming that is high-sense/intensely humorous/barely nonsensical.
* Year
* Lucky Bag Title
* Words like Limited/First Sale/Carefully Crafted
* Price notation
Are placed in the most beautiful and most insane arrangement for an advertisement.
Treat text as a **visual element, not information.**
### 9. Variation Display (For Advertising)
* Display lucky bag variations like Pine/Bamboo/Plum
* Normal/Deluxe/Insane
In a wipe-style display.
* Small frame
* Lucky Bag Name + Price
* Size that does not obstruct the main subject
---
### 10. Background/Light
* Bright, hopeful light of the first sale.
* Changes to gorgeous/pop/strange/serene, depending on the reference image.
* Maximize the texture of materials, logos, and the edges of text.
---
### 11. Final Tone (Output Guideline)
**Looks genuinely for sale,
all contents are visible,
yet clearly not ordinary.**
Character x Lucky Bag x Advertising Key Visual
Completed form.

[3. Generation Instructions]
Scene & Composition:
A photorealistic night view photograph of a huge, modern skyscraper or large commercial facility in the city. A wide-angle shot looking up diagonally from the street, emphasizing overwhelming height and scale. Include a crowd of spectators looking up in the dark foreground.

Crucial: Projection Physics & Texture Mapping:
FULL FACADE COVERAGE: The projection mapping covers the entire visible facade of the station from edge to edge. No part of the red brick wall remains unlit; the whole building is transformed into a colorful amusement park canvas.

SURFACE INTEGRATION (NO FLOATING): The images (character, text, effects) must act as a "texture skin" applied directly to the building's surface. Absolutely NO floating holograms or signboards in mid-air. The projection must follow the physical contours of the architecture.

REALISTIC DISTORTION: The projected light bends around the curved pillars, dips into the window recesses, and reveals the rough grain of the brick texture underneath. The windows and reliefs modify the shape of the projected image.

NO SPILLOVER: The projection is strictly confined to the building's silhouette. The night sky remains pitch black.

Projection Content (Amusement Park Theme):
Character: A giant dynamic dance pose of the [1. Character Features] is projected onto the building wall, but it is a **"picture drawn with light on the wall"** and is integrated with the building's structure.
Text: [2. Text to Display] is projected as neon light, utilizing the space of windows and walls.
On the upper part of the building, a graphic of a rotating Ferris wheel is projected, making the top floors look like a glowing circular attraction.
Roller coaster tracks and cars running along the wall surface.
On the lower floors, decorations like merry-go-round horses and circus tents.
Graphics of balloons, flags, and fireworks are placed seamlessly.
Style: Ultra-high resolution night view photograph, cinematic lighting. Generate it strictly as a **"photograph of a real landscape,"** not a digital illustration. Realistically depict light diffraction, image distortion due to wall irregularities, and the shadow of the bricks. Aspect ratio 16:9.
